title: How to Make Parmesan Lime Grilled Corn

steps.headline: Soak the corn for about 10 minutes in cold water.
Blend the butter, oil and lime peel in a small bowl cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator.
Preheat the grill to medium to high direct heat
Place the corn on a grill rock and grill for about 10-12 minutes.
Turn the corn a few times while it is grilling to get it evenly cooked,
Remove from the Grill, tear off the husks and silks.
steps.description: Spread the butter mixture evenly on the corn, and sprinkle with Parmesan Cheese.

steps.headline: Add salt and pepper to taste

text: Soak the corn for about 10 minutes in cold water.  Blend the butter, oil and lime peel in a small bowl cover with plastic wrap and place in the refrigerator.  Preheat the grill to medium to high direct heat  Place the corn on a grill rock and grill for about 10-12 minutes.  Turn the corn a few times while it is grilling to get it evenly cooked,  Remove from the Grill, tear off the husks and silks. Spread the butter mixture evenly on the corn, and sprinkle with Parmesan Cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste  Finished.
